title: Hidden Object Home Makeover 2 [FINAL] 2014 (HOG) Foxy Games
description:
Can you help Emma save her Uncle's house and decorate it?

Home Makeover 2 is here. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bigger and much better than before! Get carried away in an immersive Hidden Object adventure story line. Find objects inside this old estate by the river. Sell Hidden Objects to neighbors for money to restore the place with new furniture, find the missing house deed and more! This game is sure to take you on a fun Hidden Object adventure you wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to step away from.

This Hidden Object game combines 3 popular game mechanics: Hidden Object, Time Management and Match 3 all fun!

Without a doubt itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one of the best games out there!

Will you be the big fish with the highest score?

Main features:
- Story Mode: Help Emma save this family treasure! Hold garage sales to earn money needed to buy new furniture. Search for Hidden Objects high and low!
- Game Modes: There are more than 10 distinct game modes, so you won't feel bored playing this game over and over again!
- Tutorial: There is a tutorial for new features introduced into the game, so that you will understand completely what you're doing!
- Unlimited Game: Unlimited levels which span around 15 gorgeous casual scenes!
- Achievements: 8 exciting achievements and 1 Ultimate trophy for you to pursue!
- Player Profiles: Create up to 5 profiles so that everyone in the family can play!
- Match 3 game: On occasion you will also get to play a fun Match 3 Minigame! A really fun and refreshing quick break from finding hidden objects!
- Extra Content: Play 4 different game modes anytime when you want a quick session!
- Zoom feature: A must-have feature for every Hidden Object gamer this will help you search for Hidden Objects, especially the smaller items!
- Bonus Fun Facts: So you can learn useful fun facts as you search for casual hidden objects!
There's a RELAX MODE setting in the game's PAUSE menu in case you prefer casual Gameplay (some game modes are not affected by this setting)
